parameters.item/description:
Dear @{outputs('Contact')?['body/firstname']},

HIE are pleased to formally confirm your appointed account manager to support you in furthering the aspirations of your organisation. I can confirm your account manager and contact details are as follows:

Account Manager Name : @{outputs('Account_Owner')?['body/fullname']}
Contact email: @{outputs('Account_Owner')?['body/internalemailaddress']}
Contact number: @{outputs('Account_Owner')?['body/address1_telephone1']}

As an account managed client, for the terms of this engagement please visit HIE’s privacy statement on our website.

If you have any queries, please get in touch with us at: dataprotectionofficer@hient.co.uk.

We have just launched our new and improved website. We would encourage you to sign up for a My HIE account where you can save content like news, reports, products and events to an online profile; update your contact details and view tailored content based on your interests and preferences.
Your account manager will be in touch with you in due course, in the meantime if you have any questions don’t hesitate to get in touch.

Kind regards @{variables('Account Owner')}

parameters.item/description:
@{outputs('Account')?['body/name']} has been approved for Account Management.  Please create the Client Plan and complete
 - Business Review
 - Growth Plan
 - Action Plan

Dear @{outputs('Contact')?['body/firstname']}

As detailed in our terms of engagement letter we will from time to time review our relationship with account managed client. As discussed at our meeting on insert date you will no longer be formally account managed by HIE at this time. 

(If signposting) I would like to advise that Business Gateway/Just Enterprise/other is the agency that is best placed to provide you with advice and other support services at this time.

(Examples for Business gateway/Just enterprise below - delete as appropriate. If neither is the right fit for the client, please use your judgment to decide what is best if signposting is not appropriate i.e. for a large company)
Business Gateway offers free access to a range of professional resources, support and tools to help you learn new skills, create new opportunities and develop sustainable strategies for growth

Just Enterprise is a support programme to help and support social enterprises and social entrepreneurs achieve their trading ambitions.

Your local Business Gateway contact is:
Name
Email
Phone Number 

Your organisation will no longer appear on the monthly published account management list. However, if your circumstances change and there is an opportunity for HIE to help support accelerated growth/growth ambitions, Business Gateway/other will discuss your plans with us to ascertain if there are any areas that HIE would be able to support. 
I would like to take this opportunity to thank you for your ongoing contribution to the region’s economy, and wish you and your organisation every success in the future.

@{variables('Account Owner')}
